website_summaries.verdict: Between this tarp’s vibrant red coloring and lightweight construction, it is a great option for keeping dry and staying visible in the great outdoors.
pros: Great for lighter usage, like camping or yard projects
cons: May be up to 2% smaller than the advertised size

customer_reviews.title: Actual size is NOT 8' x 10'
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much as advertised except for the size. Red Tarp. Medium Duty. With grommets. It'll work fine for my usage but the actual size was 7" short on both length and width. Only 7' 5" x 9' 5". There's fine print on the label that says "Finished size is approximately 6" smaller or up to 2% smaller". 2% of 10' (120") is 2.4". So clearly it's quite a bit smaller than "up to 2% smaller". That's actually 5.8% smaller in length and 7.3% smaller in width than advertised. Fine point, but jeez just give me an actual 8' x 10' tarp for crying out loud or put measurements on the ad that reflect what it actually is. Be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Speedbrake

customer_reviews.title: Regular tarp, but RED!
customer_reviews.text: Made a TRUMP camp hut with this and a blue and white one also!! Go AMERICA!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Love the Color
customer_reviews.text: Good tarp.. works fine for what I wanted.. Got tarps to make tents for my grandkids.. they loved them.. I have a fence and I put a tarp on each side to make a tent so they can camp together without touching each others stuff.. lol....I also put tarps down on the ground for them to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: I love the  color.
customer_reviews.text: I did not use this in wet weather yet. So I don’t know whether is water resistant or not. It is a little bigger than I expected but I will keep it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Browne

customer_reviews.title: The product being the correct size is important for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, matches my color scheme. But um, I ordered a 8x10. As you can see it's on a 8×10 tarp & it's short. Too short for what I need it for. I want the correct size please & thank you
customer_reviews.author: Vee Sumblin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a good red tarp. More of a maroon than a bright red though, but it's good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Brandt

customer_reviews.title: It's a tarp, works, cleans up great.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to cover my kids small inflatable pool and it works on. But I can cover anything with it like their slides on a hot day, our patio table, I use it inside for their play area to play with playdough, puzzles, etc. It works and cleanup is a breeze... It's not as thick as I thought it would be but I am fine with it as I needed a tarp anyway.
customer_reviews.author: P. Saggar

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy tarp
customer_reviews.text: These seam to be a very sturdy tarp. Purchased to use as needed when camping.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Colors For Art Tables!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent S&H.... great colors as well!!!! Can't wait to use these on my tables in my Art room!!! Should last forever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karrissian Mickel

customer_reviews.title: pretty good quality
customer_reviews.text: It's red. It's a tarp! pretty good quality. Withstood dust storms and thunderstorm so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Comer

customer_reviews.title: Tarps excellent choice for canopy sidewalls.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 6 of these tarps for sidewalls on my 10x10 Ohio State canopy. They worked perfectly. Just used zip ties to fasten to canopy frame. I had about 18" of tarp left over at base, but it was not an issue, but would be nice if the company offered a tarp to fit these canopy sides perfectly. Canopy sides usually cost $25 to $30.00. So, at $10.99/side- it's a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: kt

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I held my breath until it arrived since it looks a little pink in the photo, but it's a true red. It was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new tarp. Did the job intended it for.
customer_reviews.author: Sal Martinez Jr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tarp works great for what I needed it for. It is in perfect condition too.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Minimally meets needs.
customer_reviews.text: It met my needs, but I found product quality to be better in local national chain stores.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: It's a red plastic tarp. Note that the red ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a red plastic tarp. Note that the red is not really NC State Wolfpack red. Slightly different shade. That was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

product_meta.title: 8 Ft. X 10 Ft. High Visibility RED Tarp - 3.3 Oz.
product_meta.description: Made of woven polyethylene, tarps are weather and tear resistant, UV lamination, heat-sealed seams, grommets, and reinforced edging with strong poly rope inside hem on four sides.
feature_bullets: 3.3 oz per square yard, 7-8 mill thickness

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars62 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
